parameters.name: PathChain
parameters.description: Array of fully qualified paths to parent assembly components, up to and including the first non-virtual parent assembly component, if the model is a virtual component

parameters.name: TitleChain
parameters.description: Array of document titles; each document title corresponds to a fully qualified path in PathChain

title: IModelDocExtension.IsVirtualComponent3
description: Gets the paths to parent assembly components, up to and including the first non-virtual parent, if the model is a virtual component.
signature:
System.Boolean IsVirtualComponent3( 
   out System.Object
PathChain
,
   out System.Object
TitleChain
)

parameters.name: PathChain
parameters.description: Array of fully qualified paths to parent assembly components, up to and including the first non-virtual parent assembly component, if the model is a virtual component

parameters.name: TitleChain
parameters.description: Array of document titles; each document title corresponds to a fully qualified path in PathChain

returns: True if the component is virtual, false if not
